#!/usr/bin/env bash

#set -e

ROOT_PATH="$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)"
source ${ROOT_PATH}/scripts/_helper

LC_BASE_DIR="${ROOT_PATH}/cmd/lc_base"
DB_FILE="${LC_BASE_DIR}/data.db"

mkdir -p "${LC_BASE_DIR}"

if ! [ -f "${DB_FILE}" ]; then
  sqlite3 "${DB_FILE}" "PRAGMA auto_vacuum;"
fi

sqlite3 "${DB_FILE}" "VACUUM;"
